item.title: Scrum WIP Limits
item.description: The TLDR My team has recently been experimenting with various WIP (work in progress) limits. Actually we brought in the idea maybe a year ago, but I’ve only recently had some time to write about it with some hindsight. You can read on for quite a lot of (possibly uninteresting) detail, but the TLDR is that a WIP limit is a very valuable tool, which I would recommend any established Scrum team give a try.
